strapiPost.title: Women of OZ to Host Sunset Summit
strapiPost.content:
Next month, some of the nation's most prominent mountain biking ambassadors and industry leaders will be at the Momentary in Bentonville.

  • For women: Women of OZ is hosting the 2022 Sunset Summit on September 16-17 to teach the fundamentals of mountain biking while helping women build confidence, develop community, and encourage adventure in the mountain biking capital of the world. 
  • Who'll be there: The keynote speakers at the Sunset Summit are Anita Naidu, the first professional mountain biker of Indian heritage, and Lindsey Richter, the founder of Ladies AllRide and a previous Survivor contestant. Anneke Beerten, Bentonville resident and three-time world champion, will be an ambassador at the event. 

Click HERE for more info.
